import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about-us', templateUrl: './about-us.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about-us.component.css'] }) export class AboutUsComponent { }

9310990357

© 2020 Apna Loan. All Rights Reserved.

Reason to Choose Us

Easy Loan Approval

Meet the basic eligibility criteria and receive approval on your loan application.

Attractive interest rates

Our Loan interest rates are competitive and affordable. We let you tailor everything according to your convenience and ability to repay.

Hassle free

Our Loan lets you choose the loan amount, tenure and EMI period for which you need the loan.

100% Safe and Secure

Your information and privacy are of utmost concern for us.
